original: *** Find the entrance to the Mansion and then locate and Destroy its ghostly power source! ***
zh_trans: *** 找到公馆的入口，然后寻找并根除其闹鬼的源头 ***

original: *** Hold Off Zombies for 20 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 守住这群僵尸20秒 ***

original: *** Gate Open!!! ***
*** All those still in the dark forest will be banished to the pit in 30 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 所有还在黑暗森林的玩家将在30秒后放逐到深坑 ***

original: *** Locate 1 of the 4 hidden Safe Zones and Hold off til the way to the tower is open ***
zh_trans: *** 找到四个隐藏安全区的其中一个，坚守到前往高塔的路开启 ***

original: *** Safe zone exits will open in 60 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 安全区出口会在60秒后打开 ***

original: *** All those in the Lobby will be banished to the pit in 30 seconds! ***
zh_trans: *** 所有还在大厅的玩家将在30秒后放逐到深坑! ***

original: *** Destroy the Rouge Luma ***
zh_trans: *** 摧毁发着红光的东西 ***

original: *** Star Door will open in 35 seconds ***
zh_trans: *** 星星门会在35秒后打开 ***

original: *** The Haunted Dimension has become unstable ***
zh_trans: *** 闹鬼的维度已经变得不稳定了 ***

original: *** We must escape the mansion before it take us with it! ***
zh_trans: *** 我们必须在这座公馆把我们困住之前逃出去! ***

original: *** All those in the tower will be banished to the pit in 15 seconds! ***
zh_trans: *** 所有还在高塔里的玩家将在15秒后放逐到深坑! ***

original: *** All those still in the courtyard will be banished to the pit in 30 seconds! ***
zh_trans: *** 所有还在院子里的玩家将在30秒后放逐到深坑! ***

original: *** Bowser has ambushed and cut you all off from the exit! ***
zh_trans: *** 库巴伏击了你们，把你们挡住了出口前! ***

original: *** Defend yourselfs and hope that Luigi can rescue you in time ! ***
zh_trans: *** 保护好你自己，希望路易吉能够及时来救你 ! ***

original: *** Beware of Bowser's Fire Breath! ***
zh_trans: *** 小心库巴的火焰呼吸! ***

original: *** Luigi has arrived ***
zh_trans: *** 路易吉来了！ ***

original: *** Luigi will now help by lowering the bridge ***
zh_trans: *** 路易吉现在在降下吊桥 ***

original: *** Luigi has done it!! ***
zh_trans: *** 路易吉搞定了!! ***

original: *** Get across the bridge before it breaks! ***
zh_trans: *** 在桥破碎之前跨过大桥! ***

original: *** GET OUT NOW ***
